item.title: HDFC Asset Management Company Hits Intraday High with Strong Market Showing
item.description: HDFC Asset Management Company recorded a robust intraday performance on 18 Dec 2025, surging to an intraday high of ₹2,674.95, reflecting a 5.26% gain. The stock outpaced the broader Sensex and its sector peers, marking a notable rebound after three consecutive sessions of decline. Time: 6 minutes ago

item.title: GE Vernova T&D India Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure
